posts.Title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2
posts.Writer: James Gunn, Dan Abnett, Andy Lanning
posts.Actors: Chris Pratt, Zoe Saldana, Dave Bautista
posts.Plot: The Guardians struggle to keep together as a team while dealing with their personal family issues, notably Star-Lord's encounter with his father, the ambitious celestial being Ego.
posts.Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. 15 wins & 60 nominations total
